title: Registration
text:
The event will be hold at Roche Shanghai site and live streamed, so perfect for attendees from Asia! Please mark the 28th and 29th August 2023 and register here:

Workshop invitations and preparation details for the practice will be sent out in emails. This event is sponsored/organized by Roche PD China Data Sciences and advertised also through the R User Group (RUG) China.

title: Open Source Clinical Reporting summeR
text:
The call for abstracts is open from now till the 21st of June!
The main focus of this workshop is: open-source & collaboration in Pharma, sharing experience in using open-sourced R packages for

SDTM mapping
ADAM data creation
TLG creation

Key dates:

Conference date August 28-29.
Abstract submission open until June 21st.
Only 80 seats available on-site, first come first served basis.
Online registration will open till August 14th.
